sentences: María Lucía Sánchez Benítez, known as Malú, is a Spanish singer.
She is the niece of the composer and guitarist Paco de Lucía, and is known for songs such as "Aprendiz", "Como Una Flor", "Toda", "Diles", "Si Estoy Loca" and "No Voy a Cambiar".
In June 2020, she gave birth to a daughter with Albert Rivera, a former Citizens politician.
"El amor es una cosa simple (ft Tiziano Ferro)"
